name: tm15
effect: Teaches Hyper Beam to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Hyper Beam to a compatible Pokémon.

flavor_text.black_white: The target is attacked with a powerful beam. The user must rest on the next turn to regain its energy.
flavor_text.black_2_white_2: The target is attacked with a powerful beam. The user must rest on the next turn to regain its energy.
